scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo 'Current dir:' && pwd && echo 'Listing:' && ls -la && echo 'Looking for frontend...' && ls -la .. || true && if [ -d /tmp/build*/frontend ]; then cd /tmp/build*/frontend && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p /tmp/build*/backend/static && cp -r out/* /tmp/build*/backend/static/; else echo 'Trying relative path...'; cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && mkdir -p static && cp -r ../frontend/out/* static/; fi
